name: Dream Lock
description:
Dream lock is a physics game created in the GMTK Game Jam 2020, in which the character cannot move since he is immersed in a sleep paralysis. The player has to drag the environment  to help the character to wake up.

Controlls:

Click and hold to drag the items
R to reset the level
ESC to exit. 

Team: 

Game Designer: Francisco Esnaola
Coding: Martin Olsson
Art: Fernanda Arrebillaga y Paula Vallespir.
